Units
^^^^^

Energy and distance:
--------------------

Units of energy and distance in **pylastic**'s in- and output are determined by the natural units of the DFT code used:

+------------+------------+-----------+
|            | Energy     | Distance  |
+============+============+===========+
| **VASP**   | eV         | Angstrom  |
+------------+------------+-----------+
|**exciting**| Ry         | Bohr      |
+------------+------------+-----------+
|**espresso**| Ry         | Bohr      |
+------------+------------+-----------+
| **WIEN2k** | Ry         | Bohr      |
+------------+------------+-----------+


Elastic constants:
------------------

Given in GPa Units

Phonon calculations:
--------------------

Frequency in THz
